mapper.insert: insert into WAQ_ASIS_DMN_CD_VAL (RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, DMN_ID, DMN_LNM, DMN_PNM, RQST_DCD, RVW_STS_CD, RVW_CONTS, VRF_CD, VRF_RMK, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, ASIS_DIT, ASIS_SYSTEM_NM, ASIS_GROUP_NM, ASIS_PART_NM, ASIS_BIZ_NM, ASIS_BIZ_CD, ASIS_DB_NM, ASIS_TBL_NM, ASIS_COL_ID, ASIS_COL_NM, CODE_NM, DFD_COL_NM, DFD_COL_VALUE, CODE_VALUE, CODE_DISP_NUM, APP_TEAM_NM, APP_CHRG_NM, TSF_TEAM_NM, TSF_CHRG_NM, LAST_CHG_DT, ADD_NOTE1, ADD_NOTE2, ADD_NOTE3, ADD_NOTE4, APP_SI_NM) values (#{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dmnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dmnPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{asisDit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{asisSystemNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{asisGroupNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{asisPartNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{asisBizNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{asisBizCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{asisDbNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{asisTblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{asisColId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{asisColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{codeNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dfdColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dfdColValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{codeValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{codeDispNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appTeamNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appChrgNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tsfTeamNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tsfChrgNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastChgDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{addNote1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addNote2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addNote3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addNote4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appSiNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

SELECT COALESCE(MAX(RQST_SNO), 0) + 1 FROM WAQ_ASIS_DMN_CD_VAL WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo}

update WAQ_ASIS_DMN_CD_VAL
DMN_ID = #{dmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DMN_LNM = #{dmnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DMN_PNM = #{dmnPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_CD = #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_RMK = #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ASIS_DIT = #{asisDit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ASIS_SYSTEM_NM = #{asisSystemNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ASIS_GROUP_NM = #{asisGroupNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ASIS_PART_NM = #{asisPartNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ASIS_BIZ_NM = #{asisBizNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ASIS_BIZ_CD = #{asisBizCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ASIS_DB_NM = #{asisDbNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ASIS_TBL_NM = #{asisTblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ASIS_COL_ID = #{asisColId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ASIS_COL_NM = #{asisColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CODE_NM = #{codeNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DFD_COL_NM = #{dfdColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DFD_COL_VALUE = #{dfdColValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CODE_VALUE = #{codeValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CODE_DISP_NUM = #{codeDispNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APP_TEAM_NM = #{appTeamNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APP_CHRG_NM = #{appChrgNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TSF_TEAM_NM = #{tsfTeamNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TSF_CHRG_NM = #{tsfChrgNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_CHG_DT = #{lastChgDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ADD_NOTE1 = #{addNote1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADD_NOTE2 = #{addNote2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADD_NOTE3 = #{addNote3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADD_NOTE4 = #{addNote4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APP_SI_NM = #{appSiNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update WAQ_ASIS_DMN_CD_VAL set DMN_ID = #{dmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DMN_LNM = #{dmnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DMN_PNM = #{dmnPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VRF_CD = #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VRF_RMK = #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ASIS_DIT = #{asisDit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ASIS_SYSTEM_NM = #{asisSystemNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ASIS_GROUP_NM = #{asisGroupNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ASIS_PART_NM = #{asisPartNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ASIS_BIZ_NM = #{asisBizNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ASIS_BIZ_CD = #{asisBizCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ASIS_DB_NM = #{asisDbNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ASIS_TBL_NM = #{asisTblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ASIS_COL_ID = #{asisColId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ASIS_COL_NM = #{asisColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CODE_NM = #{codeNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DFD_COL_NM = #{dfdColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DFD_COL_VALUE = #{dfdColValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CODE_VALUE = #{codeValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CODE_DISP_NUM = #{codeDispNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_TEAM_NM = #{appTeamNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_CHRG_NM = #{appChrgNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TSF_TEAM_NM = #{tsfTeamNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TSF_CHRG_NM = #{tsfChrgNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_CHG_DT = #{lastChgDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ADD_NOTE1 = #{addNote1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADD_NOTE2 = #{addNote2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADD_NOTE3 = #{addNote3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADD_NOTE4 = #{addNote4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_SI_NM = #{appSiNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
--ASIS 유효값 요청서 리스트 조회 SELECT A.RQST_NO, A.RQST_SNO, A.DMN_ID, A.DMN_LNM, A.DMN_PNM, A.RQST_DCD, A.RVW_CONTS, A.VRF_CD, A.VRF_RMK, A.OBJ_DESCN, A.OBJ_VERS, A.REG_TYP_CD, A.FRS_RQST_DTM, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, A.RQST_DTM, A.RQST_USER_ID, A.APRV_DTM, A.APRV_USER_ID, A.ASIS_DIT, A.ASIS_SYSTEM_NM, A.ASIS_GROUP_NM, A.ASIS_PART_NM, A.ASIS_BIZ_NM, A.ASIS_BIZ_CD, A.ASIS_DB_NM, A.ASIS_TBL_NM, A.ASIS_COL_ID, A.ASIS_COL_NM, A.CODE_NM, A.DFD_COL_NM, A.DFD_COL_VALUE, A.CODE_VALUE, A.CODE_DISP_NUM, A.APP_TEAM_NM, A.APP_CHRG_NM, A.TSF_TEAM_NM, A.TSF_CHRG_NM, A.LAST_CHG_DT, A.ADD_NOTE1, A.ADD_NOTE2, A.ADD_NOTE3, A.ADD_NOTE4, A.APP_SI_NM
, CASE WHEN A.RVW_STS_CD = '2' THEN '2' ELSE '0' END AS RVW_STS_CD
, A.RVW_STS_CD
, CASE WHEN A.VRF_CD = '2' THEN '#FF0000' ELSE CASE WHEN A.VRF_CD = '5' THEN '#0000FF' END END AS FontColor , U.USER_NM AS RQST_USER_NM FROM WAQ_ASIS_DMN_CD_VAL A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U ON A.RQST_USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND U.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND U.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND A.VRF_CD = '1'
ORDER BY A.RQST_SNO
mapper.update: UPDATE WAQ_ASIS_DMN_CD_VAL A SET A.REG_TYP_CD = (SELECT CASE WHEN A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' THEN 'D' ELSE CASE WHEN MAX(B.DMN_ID ) IS NULL THEN 'C' ELSE 'U' END END FROM WAM_ASIS_DMN_CD_VAL B WHERE B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND A.CODE_VALUE = B.CODE_VALUE AND A.ASIS_DB_NM = B.ASIS_DB_NM AND A.ASIS_TBL_NM = B.ASIS_TBL_NM AND A.ASIS_COL_NM = B.ASIS_COL_NM ) ,A.VRF_CD = '4' WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UPDATE WAQ_ASIS_DMN_CD_VAL
RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd} , RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts} , APRV_DTM = NOW() , APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId} ,
WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND VRF_CD = '1' AND COALESCE(RVW_STS_CD, '_') != '2'
mapper.insert: --검증쿼리 : 변경일 때 변경된 데이터가 없을 경우 (PT000) AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'U' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_ASIS_DMN_CD_VAL D WHERE D.CODE_VALUE = A.CODE_VALUE AND D.ASIS_DB_NM = A.ASIS_DB_NM AND D.ASIS_TBL_NM = A.ASIS_TBL_NM AND D.ASIS_COL_NM = A.ASIS_COL_NM AND COALESCE(A.DMN_ID ,'_') = COALESCE(D.DMN_ID ,'_') AND COALESCE(A.DMN_LNM ,'_') = COALESCE(D.DMN_LNM ,'_') AND COALESCE(A.DMN_PNM ,'_') = COALESCE(D.DMN_PNM ,'_') AND COALESCE(A.OBJ_DESCN ,'_') = COALESCE(D.OBJ_DESCN ,'_') AND COALESCE(A.ASIS_DIT ,'_') = COALESCE(D.ASIS_DIT ,'_') AND COALESCE(A.ASIS_SYSTEM_NM,'_') = COALESCE(D.ASIS_SYSTEM_NM,'_') AND COALESCE(A.CODE_NM ,'_') = COALESCE(D.CODE_NM ,'_') AND COALESCE(A.DFD_COL_NM ,'_') = COALESCE(D.DFD_COL_NM ,'_') AND COALESCE(A.DFD_COL_VALUE ,'_') = COALESCE(D.DFD_COL_VALUE ,'_') AND COALESCE(A.CODE_DISP_NUM ,'_') = COALESCE(D.CODE_DISP_NUM ,'_') AND COALESCE(A.APP_TEAM_NM ,'_') = COALESCE(D.APP_TEAM_NM ,'_') AND COALESCE(A.APP_CHRG_NM ,'_') = COALESCE(D.APP_CHRG_NM ,'_') AND COALESCE(A.TSF_TEAM_NM ,'_') = COALESCE(D.TSF_TEAM_NM ,'_') AND COALESCE(A.TSF_CHRG_NM ,'_') = COALESCE(D.TSF_CHRG_NM ,'_') AND COALESCE(A.LAST_CHG_DT ,'_') = COALESCE(D.LAST_CHG_DT ,'_') AND COALESCE(A.ADD_NOTE1 ,'_') = COALESCE(D.ADD_NOTE1 ,'_') AND COALESCE(A.ADD_NOTE2 ,'_') = COALESCE(D.ADD_NOTE2 ,'_') AND COALESCE(A.ADD_NOTE3 ,'_') = COALESCE(D.ADD_NOTE3 ,'_') AND COALESCE(A.ADD_NOTE4 ,'_') = COALESCE(D.ADD_NOTE4 ,'_') AND COALESCE(A.APP_SI_NM ,'_') = COALESCE(D.APP_SI_NM ,'_') )
mapper.sql: , DMN_LNM, DMN_PNM, RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, ASIS_DIT, ASIS_SYSTEM_NM, ASIS_GROUP_NM, ASIS_PART_NM, ASIS_BIZ_NM, ASIS_BIZ_CD, ASIS_DB_NM, ASIS_TBL_NM, ASIS_COL_ID, ASIS_COL_NM, CODE_NM, DFD_COL_NM, DFD_COL_VALUE, CODE_VALUE, CODE_DISP_NUM, APP_TEAM_NM, APP_CHRG_NM, TSF_TEAM_NM, TSF_CHRG_NM, LAST_CHG_DT, ADD_NOTE1, ADD_NOTE2, ADD_NOTE3, ADD_NOTE4, APP_SI_NM
mapper.select: --신규 적재 대상 추출 SELECT * FROM WAQ_ASIS_DMN_CD_VAL WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인 AND REG_TYP_CD = 'C'
mapper.update: --WAQ ID, VERS 등을 업데이트... UPDATE WAQ_ASIS_DMN_CD_VAL A SET (DMN_ID, OBJ_VERS, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID) = ( SELECT B.DMN_ID AS DMN_ID , COALESCE(B.OBJ_VERS, 0) + 1 AS OBJ_VERS , B.FRS_RQST_DTM , B.FRS_RQST_USER_ID FROM WAM_ASIS_DMN_CD_VAL B WHERE B.CODE_VALUE = A.CODE_VALUE AND B.ASIS_DB_NM = A.ASIS_DB_NM AND B.ASIS_TBL_NM = A.ASIS_TBL_NM AND B.ASIS_COL_NM = A.ASIS_COL_NM AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ) WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} --AND A.VRF_CD = '1' --등록가능 AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인 AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_ASIS_DMN_CD_VAL B WHERE B.CODE_VALUE = A.CODE_VALUE AND B.ASIS_DB_NM = A.ASIS_DB_NM AND B.ASIS_TBL_NM = A.ASIS_TBL_NM AND B.ASIS_COL_NM = A.ASIS_COL_NM AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') )
mapper.delete: --WAM 삭제 (등록유형코드가REG_TYP_CD 변경, 삭제일 경우) DELETE FROM WAM_ASIS_DMN_CD_VAL A WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_ASIS_DMN_CD_VAL B WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND B.DMN_ID = A.DMN_ID )
mapper.update: --WAH 이력 만료... UPDATE WAH_ASIS_DMN_CD_VAL A SET EXP_DTM = NOW() WHERE EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_ASIS_DMN_CD_VAL B WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND B.DMN_ID = A.DMN_ID )
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO WAQ_ASIS_DMN_CD_VAL(
) SELECT #{reqmst.rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,RQST_SNO ,PDM_TBL_ID ,PDM_TBL_PNM ,PDM_TBL_LNM ,BF_PDM_TBL_PNM ,RQST_DCD ,'0' ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ,MDL_LNM ,UPP_SUBJ_LNM ,SUBJ_ID ,SUBJ_LNM ,STD_APL_YN ,PART_TBL_YN ,DW_TRG_TBL_YN ,CRG_USER_ID ,CRG_USER_NM ,OBJ_DESCN ,OBJ_VERS ,REG_TYP_CD ,FRS_RQST_DTM ,FRS_RQST_USER_ID ,RQST_DTM ,RQST_USER_ID ,NULL ,NULL ,CTD_FCY ,DEL_CRI ,DEL_MTD ,BCK_FCY ,FULL_PATH ,USER_RQST_CNTN #{reqmst.rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , RQST_SNO , DMN_ID , DMN_LNM , DMN_PNM , RQST_DCD , 0 , NULL , NULL , NULL , NULL , OBJ_DESCN , OBJ_VERS , REG_TYP_CD , FRS_RQST_DTM , FRS_RQST_USER_ID , RQST_DTM , RQST_USER_ID , NULL , NULL , ASIS_DIT , ASIS_SYSTEM_NM , ASIS_GROUP_NM , ASIS_PART_NM , ASIS_BIZ_NM , ASIS_BIZ_CD , ASIS_DB_NM , ASIS_TBL_NM , ASIS_COL_ID , ASIS_COL_NM , CODE_NM , DFD_COL_NM , DFD_COL_VALUE , CODE_VALUE , CODE_DISP_NUM , APP_TEAM_NM , APP_CHRG_NM , TSF_TEAM_NM , TSF_CHRG_NM , LAST_CHG_DT , ADD_NOTE1 , ADD_NOTE2 , ADD_NOTE3 , ADD_NOTE4 , APP_SI_NM FROM WAQ_ASIS_DMN_CD_VAL A WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{oldRqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '2'
